Reading in function from R script
```{r,message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

source("fun1.R")
```


Using sourced function to download and format data in file system:
```{r}
year = 2017
parse.retrosheet.pbp(year)
```


Reading in the data to RStudio
```{r}
fields = read_csv("fields.csv",show_col_types = FALSE)
```

```{r,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
data = read_csv(paste0("download.folder/unzipped/all",year,".csv"),
                col_names = pull(fields, Header),
                na = character(),
                show_col_types = FALSE)

rosters = read_csv(paste0("download.folder/unzipped/roster",year,".csv"), 
                   show_col_types = FALSE,
                   ) %>% select(-c(`...1`)) %>%
                         rename("Pos"=V7)
```


Viewing Data
```{r}
View(data)
View(rosters)
```
